song.title: Ceres' Pyramid
song.info:
I've just finished a small test of Amiga1200 working with MIDI. Hardware: Yamaha QY70 + Amiga 1200 (MIDI). Software: OctaMED 4.00.
Amiga 1200 - a computer launched in 1992. 14Mhz of Motorola CPU on-board. Mine has 10Mb of RAM. The song surely would work on standard 2Mb, without problems.
Yamaha QY70 has been released in 1997. It's a very small synthesizer with sequencer (but can also work in MIDI mode), similar in its look to Atari Lynx handheld game-console. Sound generation method: AWM2.
OctaMED 4.00 - the series generally has been closed in 1992 (later the program became freeware). You can use 16 channels here, in the MIDI mode, however it still works as a tracker, so - for example - You cannot put a chord into one channel: You have to use 3 separate channels to make the chord.
The full album "DEATH SQUAD" with this song - is here: http://yerzmyey.i-demo.pl
